workExperience.title: Software Engineer
workExperience.description: Intertech is a subsidiary of Denizbank Financial Services Group and provides solutions for the 15 million users across 44 banks. I worked as a software engineer at the "Individual & Corporate Loans" group, within the "Web & Shopping Flows - AG" department.
achievements: I was responsible for the development of the individual credit application at Denizbank AG. During this project, I worked with external service integrations using RESTful and WSDL APIs, UI with IWT framework, and reporting tools.

workExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
workExperience.description: Ford Otosan is the automotive company with the largest installed production capacity in the Turkish automotive industry. I worked as a Full Stack Developer in the "Material Planning & Logistics" department.
achievements: I developed export, import & material planning projects. I worked with services (RESTful & WSDL API), web applications (ASP.NET Web Forms) & reporting via Devexpress. I was involved in the transition of DevOps processes, including the development of CI/CD pipelines and the migration from TFS to GIT.
